tool_description: Creates DNS zone files with default records for new domains, supporting various hosting configurations.

primary_ip.description: Primary server IP address for A record

ttl_default.description: Default TTL for DNS records in seconds (300-86400)

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Invalid IP address: Primary IP must be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.
Invalid TTL value: TTL must be between 300 and 86400 seconds.
Unsupported email provider: Use google, microsoft, or custom for email configuration.
usage: Provide domain name and primary IP address. Optionally specify email provider for automatic MX record setup and custom TTL values.

zone_serial.description: Zone serial number for tracking changes
